abstract: The drug maker still needs approval from the United States and Candada for its $68 billion buyout of a rival.
snippet: The drug maker still needs approval from the United States and Candada for its $68 billion buyout of a rival.
lead_paragraph: Pfizer, the drug maker, has received regulatory approval from both Chinese and Australian antitrust authorities for its $68 billion buyout of a rival, Wyeth.

headline.main: Pfizer Gets Approval From China and Australia for Wyeth Deal
